title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.140 - Historical cost
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.140 - Historical cost

State Regulations

The total actual cost incurred in acquiring and preparing
a fixed asset for use. This cost includes items, if any, which would be
capitalized under generally accepted accounting principles in addition to
purchase price; e.g., installation costs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.140

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
